name: Time Apart
description:
A time nexus appears linking the present (20XX) to the precolonial era in Brazil (14XX), now our characters are linked through time and after love at first sight they now need to work together if they are to meet face to face.  The boy lives in the present and the girl in the past, she can change his reality to help him overcome his challenges, time is shattering and they'll need to fix time as they proceed towards a way to unite in this top-down coop puzzle.

Instructions:  (Gamepad) (Keyboard)
Boy: (WASD Movement)

Cut tree:                    Y             |           C

Pickup potato:       Y             |            C

Feed:                           Y             |            C

Girl: (Arrows movement)

Dig hole:                    B             |           K

Plant seed:               B             |           K

Pickup seed:           Y             |            J

Menu:                        A             |       Space
